value:
Golly, the ocean's beautiful. My
ma would sure love it. I think my
pa would too, bless his soul.

Villages on the island back home
reaped one heck of a bounty from
the sea, so we traded crops for fish!

Nothing beats fresh summer veggies!
Why don't you take a load off and
snack on 'em with me?

It ain't easy fightin' all the time.
Even Heroes need to rest their
weary bones now and then!

I love summer star-gazin' back home.
Can't wait to see what Askr's stars
look like!

I got some summer veggies for ya
from $Nf!$k$pGosh, I'm not breakin' any kinda
dress code, am I?

The ocean and I are gettin' along
swimmingly! Maybe my true calling
is bein' a fisherman...

I won't let nothin' get in the way of
these fine folks havin' a swim!

Ouch! Looks like I got a little carried
away in the sun...

Summer fun does a body good!
I'm gonna keep on getting stronger!

My name's Donnel! Huh? Why'd I
bring a pot to the beach? You never
know when it'll come in handy!

Oh, Summoner, look! There's a fish
over here I ain't ever seen before!$k$pGosh, there's new things left and
right at the ocean, from colorful fish
to tasty frozen treats!$k$pStaying here forever sounds mighty
appealin' right about now.$k$pIt's hard to believe that there are still
bad folks tryin' to hurt everyone even
in such a perfect place...$k$pWell, enough's enough! I've decided
I'm gonna do those bad suckers in so
everyone can enjoy the ocean freely!$k$p'Course, I know I can't go at it alone.
There's a lotta bad guys and only
one'a me, after all.$k$pI wonder if I could persuade anyone
to join the fight by sharin' these fresh
veggies I got...
It's a big 'un!
Bet I swim faster!
Ocean looks mighty fine!
Ain't summer great?
I got caught...
Pardon!
What a warm n' sunny day! Perfect for splashin' around in the water!
Whoa, what's that? Sure is cold! Yer tellin' me it's food?!
I've never seen so many kindsa fish! I'll be out here 'til the pigs come home!
Ain't that outfit a little heavy for this weather? Ya got me kinda worried.
Phew! I am tuckered out after all that swimmin'!
I'd sure like to show my ma how beautiful the ocean is...
I reckon this was the funnest summer of all time, 'cuz of you! Thanks a bunch!
Yup!
Awful bright...
Race ya!
